data.name: 0000 (395.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Splitting up with Koizumi's group, I stayed outside the music room with Nagato.

data.name: 0001 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What on earth is going on?

data.name: 0002 (395.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: They said they heard a piano from an empty music room, right~?

data.name: 0003 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah, exactly that. The way that club member acted was nothing to sneeze at either.

data.name: 0004 (395.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: That guy was kinda scaaary.

data.name: 0006 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Not to mention—that girl I saw.

data.name: 0007 (395.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I didn't tell this to Haruhi, but as far as I can remember, she disappeared suddenly.

data.name: 0009 (395.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Maybe Haru-nyan is right, and she really is a ghost?

data.name: 0010 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Don't be stupid. Haruhi's been messing with your head—ghosts obviously aren't real.

data.name: 0011 (395.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: They aren't?

data.name: 0012 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: They are not.

data.name: 0013 (395.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As long as Haruhi doesn't believe so, that is.

data.name: 0014 (395.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But still, even if we write off ghosts, there's definitely something going on in this school…

data.name: 0015 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: For that reason—I'd like you to investigate the music room more thoroughly.

data.name: 0016 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You okay with that, Nagato?

data.name: 0017 (395.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: …Understood.

data.name: 0018 (395.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: With Nagato as the one investigating, if she turns up nothing, that's good enough for me.

data.name: 0019 (395.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi can ask me to investigate or keep lookout as much as she wants…

data.name: 0020 (395.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …but I'm gonna join Nagato for some reading in the clubroom--maybe even while drinking tea.

data.name: 0021 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What are you reading at the moment?

data.name: 0022 (395.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: This.

data.name: 0023 (395.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She pulled out a small paperback book from her pocket.

data.name: 0024 (395.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: On the cover, the title appeared as if it were drifting off the coast of an island.

data.name: 0025 (395.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If Haruhi showed interest in a book like this…

data.name: 0026 (395.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …the whole SOS Brigade would probably end up lost at sea.

data.name: 0027 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hmm, an adventure novel?

data.name: 0028 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If it's any good, lend it to me once you've finished.

data.name: 0029 (395.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Understood.

data.name: 0030 (395.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Maybe it's Nagato's influence, but I've been occasionally reading during my free time lately.

data.name: 0031 (395.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I tried to recommend a book I liked to Nagato, but…

data.name: 0032 (395.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: I've already finished reading that work.

data.name: 0033 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Now I think about it, this was one you recommended to me.

data.name: 0034 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's right, you've already read it. My bad.

data.name: 0035 (395.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: …It's fine.

data.name: 0036 (395.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The moment she said that she fell silent—staring at the music room.

data.name: 0037 (395.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I've even been able to feel comfortable in this silence now.

data.name: 0038 (395.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's not that I think the SOS Brigade has had only negative effects on me.

data.name: 0039 (395.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: I don't hear any piano sound.

data.name: 0040 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: No kidding—the door's locked.

data.name: 0041 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: There's no one inside.

data.name: 0042 (395.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: The close examination of the space is finished.

data.name: 0043 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: How was it? If it turned up nothing, let's go hang around in the…

data.name: 0044 (395.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: I confirmed an unstable point in this space's data link status.

data.name: 0045 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Uhh? What's that?

data.name: 0046 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: The space's data links are unstable? Wh-what do you mean?

data.name: 0047 (395.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: What does thaaat mean?

data.name: 0048 (395.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Ugh—not good.

data.name: 0049 (395.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: There's no way we can let her hear what we're talking about.

data.name: 0050 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Whoooaa—! S-sister—!!

data.name: 0051 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm so thirsty I think I'm gonna die—!!

data.name: 0052 (395.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: You're not gonna die just from being thiiiirsty.

data.name: 0053 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If I say I'm gonna die, I'm gonna die! G-go buy me some juice!!

data.name: 0054 (395.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Ehh—You can just go yourself.

data.name: 0055 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Guh—! It hurts! You can buy some for yourself as well then.

data.name: 0056 (395.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: R-really?!

data.name: 0057 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Muhhh! Quickly… If I dont' get water quickly I'm gonna die—!

data.name: 0058 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: B-buy whatever you want.

data.name: 0059 (395.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Oh Kyon, you're so kind! Well—I'll be back, okayyyy!

data.name: 0060 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Phew—She's gone?

data.name: 0062 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: D-don't look at me like that.

data.name: 0063 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: There's no way we can let her hear, right?

data.name: 0064 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So, what's going on in this music room?

data.name: 0065 (395.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: A local non-corrosive alternate space-time is generating indepenently in a limited mode.

data.name: 0066 (395.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: There are traces that prove it is overlaying normal space.

data.name: 0067 (395.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: A being with the ability to manipulate data is accessing the music room's spacial information.

data.name: 0068 (395.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: But the manipulation method is naive. The space's data links are destabilising.

data.name: 0069 (395.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: If the space's data links break…

data.name: 0070 (395.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: …the being existing in the alternate space will appear in normal space.

data.name: 0071 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wait, so in other words--that thing in the other space is trying to appear in…

data.name: 0072 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …the music room? Is that what you're saying?

data.name: 0073 (395.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Yes.

data.name: 0074 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You don't know what that thing is?

data.name: 0075 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If that thing is an interdimensional soba delivery, we still have a way of covering it up.

data.name: 0076 (395.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Cannot identify with the present data. At the very least, it isn't human.

data.name: 0077 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Right, understood. I get it, but…

data.name: 0078 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: How long are those data links going to hold for?

data.name: 0079 (395.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: A maximum of 81 minutes and 24 seconds—a minimum of 0 seconds.

data.name: 0080 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Zero seconds?!

data.name: 0081 (395.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: It would not be strange for it to collapse at any moment.

data.name: 0082 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Damn it… Couldn't you have some more endurance…

data.name: 0083 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Haruhi's going to get back here at some point, right? What do we do?

data.name: 0084 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: For the time being, let's just find a reason to keep Haruhi away from the music room.

data.name: 0085 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Any ideas, Nagato?

data.name: 0086 (395.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: …My role is to gather data.

data.name: 0087 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ah, that's right.

data.name: 0088 (395.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: In other words—it's not her intention to get directly involved with Haruhi.

data.name: 0089 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's not like I'm trying to leave it all to you.

data.name: 0090 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'll take care of it.

data.name: 0092 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: How about we hide the key to the music room?

data.name: 0093 (395.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: There's a high chance the corrosion will reach the door or the surrounding walls.

data.name: 0094 (395.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: We can assume a normal key will lose any meaning.

data.name: 0095 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's no good then…? I thought I was onto something there.

data.name: 0096 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: How about we switch the plates with the neighboring art room and then hide the key?

data.name: 0097 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Haruhi surprisingly might not even notice?

data.name: 0098 (395.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: We can also suppose a case where the volume of the space that being appears from…

data.name: 0099 (395.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: …exceeds the volume of the music room.

data.name: 0100 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So something bigger than the music room might come out?

data.name: 0101 (395.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Yes.

data.name: 0102 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I guess that's more than we can reasonably cover up then…

data.name: 0103 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Our quickest option would be to erase the abnormal space before Haruhi gets here…

data.name: 0104 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Is that doable?

data.name: 0105 (395.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: That is doable.

data.name: 0106 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hmm…

data.name: 0107 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nagato—I fully understand that you have your role…

data.name: 0108 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: But just this once—is there anything we can do with your abilities?

data.name: 0109 (395.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: The Data Overmind does not desire inter- ference into situations beyond the regulations.

data.name: 0110 (395.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: It will cause uncertain changes.

data.name: 0111 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …In other words—the rest of us are on our own?

data.name: 0113 (395.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: No response… then?

data.name: 0114 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Let's say I was—no, we were trying to do something for Haruhi…

data.name: 0115 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Would you help us, Nagato?

data.name: 0117 (395.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Nagato gave a tiny nod without saying a word.

data.name: 0118 (395.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: So she's gonna stick with her stance as an SOS Brigade member 'till the bitter end, huh?

data.name: 0119 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I guess we have no choice but to continue always relying on you.

data.name: 0120 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: For now I'll have to get through this by myself.

data.name: 0121 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Alright, I've decided on a plan.

data.name: 0122 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'll need get help from Asahina and Koizumi.

data.name: 0124 (395.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Kyon! I got juice!

data.name: 0125 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Oh, great work. Now your big brother won't have to die.

data.name: 0126 (395.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Here's yours, Yuki! I got you tea, is that okay?

data.name: 0128 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Take it. It's my treat.

data.name: 0129 (395.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: It's a treat~!

data.name: 0131 (395.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Looks like I'll have to do a bit of work if I drink this.

data.name: 0132 (395.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Ask for Nagato's reccomendation

data.name: 0133 (395.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Reccomend to Nagato

data.name: 0134 (395.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Ask Nagato for help

data.name: 0135 (395.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Handle it by yourself
